mapper.select: SELECT a.academy_id, a.academy_name, a.address, a.phone, AVG((r.education_rating + r.instructor_rating + r.facility_rating + r.atmosphere_rating + r.management_rating + r.later_rating) / 6) AS average_rating, AVG(r.education_rating) AS education_rating, AVG(r.instructor_rating) AS instructor_rating, AVG(r.facility_rating) AS facility_rating, AVG(r.atmosphere_rating) AS atmosphere_rating, AVG(r.management_rating) AS management_rating, AVG(r.later_rating) AS later_rating FROM academy a LEFT JOIN review r ON a.academy_id = r.academy_id GROUP BY a.academy_id, a.academy_name, a.address, a.phone ORDER BY average_rating DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
